sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: Having written the white papers, case studies, brochure, and user cases we now have an opportunity to present them on the website (and incorporate them on a Freedom Toaster Info CD...)

sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: These two sections set out the ideas behind the update for the website.

sect2.title: Document Purposes:
sect2.para: In order to place the various documents within the Freedom Toaster website we need to understand the purpose of each type of document and then create a place for that purpose on the website.

listitem.para: The main purpose of the user cases is to show potential hosts the possible benefits of their hosting a Freedom Toaster. The secondary purpose of the user cases is to show the benefits of the Freedom Toaster to the communities that have access to one.

The purpose of the white papers is to inform specific audiences about the potential for positive change within communities through the proliferation of Freedom Toasters and an advertisement for using/joiining the project.
The purpose of the Case Studies is to present the Freedom Toaster as a viable, working technology for the dissemination of digital electronic information.

The purpose of the brochure is to present information about the Freedom Toaster to the general public. To inform the reader about what the Freedom Toaster is, why it was developed, how it works, and where to go for more information.

sect2.para: The purpose of presenting these documents on the Freedom Toaster website is to increase awareness of what the Freedom Toaster is and how it can be used to benefit communities. It's first purpose is therefore to educate those visiting the site. The second purpose of having these documents available is so that they can be downloaded and used to promote Freedom Toaster awareness in different communities around the world.

sect2.title: Website Presentation
sect2.para: With these purposes in mind, these are the areas that need to be developed/created

listitem.para: An "Educational Resources" page that has PDFs of the brochure, case studies, and white papers, with links to subpages containing the white papers, the case studies, and the user cases.
The purpose of this page is to present the website user with tools to educate themselves and those around them.

A news article "Freedom Toaster In Action" update. Informs the reader about the FT presentation to the UN, the production of the educational material (brochure and user cases), and the production of specific case studies.
